blocks.content: Specialized Academic Council D 08.231.01 with the right to consider and conduct the defense of dissertations for the degree of Doctor of Technical Sciences in the specialties:
05.16.01 – Materials Science and Heat Treatment of Metals;
05.16.02 – Metallurgy of Ferrous, Non-Ferrous Metals and Special Alloys.
Chairman of the Council: Chernyatevych Anatolii Hryhorovych, Doctor of Technical Sciences, Professor, Chief Researcher.
Deputy Chairman: Merkulov Oleksii Yevhenovych, Doctor of Technical Sciences, Senior Researcher, Deputy Director of the Institute.
Academic Secretary: Kononenko Hanna Andriivna, Doctor of Technical Sciences, Senior Researcher.
Term of office of the Specialized Academic Council D 08.231.01 is from 26.06.2024 to 26.06.2027.
